sentences.sContent: The agony , the reverence, the love of God and of humanity in his voice, are beyond belief in this man, who minutes before was performing the rawest ribaldry.
sentences.sContent_eng: The agony , the reverence, the love of God and of humanity in his voice, are beyond belief in this man, who minutes before was performing the rawest ribaldry.
sentences.sCn: 几分钟之前这个人还在讲着最粗鄙的下流话，现在他声音里却充满了对于上帝和人类的敬畏与热爱，这简直是令人难以相信的。

synos.tran: 猥亵的话；粗俗下流的言语

words.tran: 言谈粗俗的人；说下流话的人

trans.tranCn: 猥亵的话；粗俗下流的言语
